nostrauth-desc: Allow users to login with Nostr NIP-07 browser extension
nostrauth-login-instructions: Click the button below to login using your Nostr browser extension.
nostrauth-npub-help: Your Nostr public key in bech32 format (npub1...). This will be used for authentication.
nostrauth-npub-invalid: Invalid npub format. Must start with 'npub1' followed by 58 characters.
